about.subtitle: Who I am
about.title: About me
about.text: Hey, I'm Pascal! I develop modern, high-performance web applications and enjoy turning ideas into clean and functional solutions. For me, programming is more than code â€“ it's creative problem-solving and constant improvement.
about.info1: Iâ€™m flexible and work efficiently and reliably both on-site and remotely.
about.info2: Iâ€™m open-minded, motivated, and always ready to learn new technologies and take on new challenges to grow my skills.
about.info3: I enjoy translating complex requirements into clear, user-friendly solutions and delivering projects in a structured, clean, and goal-oriented way.

skills.subtitle: Technologies
skills.title: Skill Set
skills.text: An overview of the technologies I work with. I value clean code, modern frontend patterns, and continuous learning â€“ especially in a field that evolves so quickly.
skills.questionText: Just reach out â€” I learn quickly and enjoy diving into new technologies.

projects.subtitle: Portfolio
projects.title: Featured Projects
projects.text: A selection of my best projects â€“ explore my work and skills in action.

join.title: JOIN
join.text: A modern task-management tool that simplifies team collaboration. Tasks can be planned, prioritized, and structured â€“ including a clear board view and intuitive drag-and-drop support.

sharkie.title: Sharkie
sharkie.text: A browser-based 2D game with canvas graphics, animations, and multiple enemy types. A small arcade-style adventure that runs directly in the browser.

pokemon.title: PokÃ©dex
pokemon.text: An interactive application for browsing, filtering, and viewing PokÃ©mon in detail. Perfect for quickly exploring types, attributes, and data of individual PokÃ©mon.

Burdick.text: Pascal works clearly, reliably, and with a real sense for effective solutions. His calm and structured approach makes collaboration pleasant and efficient. Anyone working with him can rely on thoughtful, well-crafted results.
Burdick.author: M. Burdick

Marrocu.text: Working with Pascal was a great experience. He consistently demonstrated responsibility, expertise, and a proactive work attitude.
Marrocu.author: M. Marrocu

Heim.text: Pascal played a key role in our teamâ€™s success. His commitment and his ability to deliver high-quality work had a clear, positive impact on our results.
Heim.author: S. Heim

Gilles.text: Pascal showed excellent teamwork and technical competence. His clear communication and structured approach helped the team stay focused and efficient at all times.
Gilles.author: S. Gilles

Berghoff.text: I know Pascal as someone with a true hands-on mentality. When something needs to get done, he rolls up his sleeves and gets started right away. What stands out to me is his persistence â€” once he begins something, he commits to it with 100%. Thanks to his approachable and open nature, we quickly developed solutions together.
Berghoff.author: T. Berghoff

Heidenreich.text: Pascal combines deep curiosity, high energy, and a genuine interest in people. He immerses himself quickly into new topics, understands connections, and brings fresh impulses into any collaboration. In conversations, he is open, direct, and appreciative, using dialogue to make well-informed decisions. One of his greatest strengths is his ability to think critically and question processes constructively. Through his drive, focus, and human warmth, he creates noticeable value in projects and teams.
Heidenreich.author: N. Heidenreich

Tappe.text: What Iâ€™ve always admired about Pascal is how conscientious and almost meticulous he works. He dives deep into his tasks while remaining impressively focused. This attitude has often inspired and impressed me.
Tappe.author: M. Tappe

Rudnick.text: Pascal is an exceptionally curious and energetic person who brings enthusiasm and heart into everything he does. He has a genuine interest in others and actively seeks meaningful exchange â€” whether to get advice or share knowledge. His versatility and the courage to pursue a new career path later in life show how open-minded and determined he is. He thinks fast, loves trying new things, and inspires others with his enthusiasm. To me, he is a special person who makes collaboration both constructive and personally enriching.
Rudnick.author: S. Rudnick

controller.heading: Controller
controller.intro: The controller within the meaning of data protection laws, in particular the EU General Data Protection Regulation (GDPR), is:
controller.name: Pascal Kasbeitzer

rights.heading: Your Data Subject Rights
rights.intro: Using the contact details provided, you may exercise the following rights at any time in accordance with the EU General Data Protection Regulation (GDPR):

items.access: Access to the data stored about you and information about its processing (Art. 15 GDPR),
items.rectification: Rectification of inaccurate personal data (Art. 16 GDPR),
items.erasure: Erasure of the data stored about you (Art. 17 GDPR),
items.restriction: Restriction of data processing if we are not yet permitted to delete your data due to legal obligations (Art. 18 GDPR),
items.objection: Objection to the processing of your data by us (Art. 21 GDPR), and
items.portability: Data portability, provided you have consented to the data processing or have entered into a contract with us (Art. 20 GDPR).

rights.revocation: If you have given us consent, you may revoke it at any time with effect for the future.
rights.complaint: You may file a complaint with a supervisory authority at any time, e.g. the authority responsible for your place of residence or the authority responsible for us as the controller.
rights.supervisoryListHtml: A list of supervisory authorities (for the non-public sector) including contact details can be found at:

logs.heading: Collection of General Information When Visiting Our Website
logs.typePurposeText1: When you access our website, meaning when you do not register or otherwise transmit information, information of a general nature is automatically collected. This information (server log files) includes, for example, the type of web browser, the operating system used, the domain name of your internet service provider, your IP address, and similar data.
logs.typePurposeText2: This information is especially processed for the following purposes:
logs.typePurposeListSmoothOperation: Ensuring the smooth operation of the website
logs.typePurposeText3: We do not use your data to draw conclusions about your person. However, we reserve the right to subsequently review the server log files if there are concrete indications of illegal use.
logs.legalBasisText: Processing is carried out pursuant to Art. 6(1)(f) GDPR based on our legitimate interest in improving the stability and functionality of our website, as well as ensuring system security and detecting misuse.
logs.recipientsText: Recipients of the data may be technical service providers acting as processors for the operation and maintenance of our website.
logs.storageText1: Data in server log files that allows identification of the data subjects is stored for a maximum of [please add information], unless a security-relevant event occurs (e.g. a DDoS attack).
logs.storageText2: In the event of such an incident, server log files are stored until the security-relevant event has been resolved and fully investigated.
logs.provisionText1: The provision of the above-mentioned personal data is neither legally nor contractually required.
logs.provisionText2: However, without the IP address we cannot guarantee the service or full functionality of our website. Individual services may be unavailable or limited.
logs.objectionText: For information on your right to object under Art. 21 GDPR, please refer to the section below.

contact.heading: Contacting Us
contact.typePurposeText1: Our website provides a contact form that can be used for electronic communication. When a user submits an inquiry via the form, the data entered in the input fields is transmitted to us and stored.
contact.typePurposeText2: At the time of sending the message, the following data is also stored:
contact.typePurposeListUrl: URL from which the request was sent
contact.typePurposeText3: Contact may also be made using the email addresses provided. In this case, the personal data transmitted with the email is stored. This includes the date and time the email was sent, the email address, IP addresses, and information about the servers involved in the email communication.
contact.typePurposeText4: You can also contact us using the telephone numbers provided. In this case, we collect log data that includes your phone number and the duration of the call.
contact.typePurposeText5: Regardless of the communication method, we collect the content of your inquiry. Your data is stored for the purpose of individual communication with you.
contact.legalBasisText1: The processing of data is based on a legitimate interest (Art. 6(1)(f) GDPR).
contact.legalBasisText2: Our legitimate interest in processing your data is to enable easy communication.
contact.legalBasisText3: If you contact us to request an offer, the data processing is carried out for pre-contractual measures (Art. 6(1)(b) GDPR).
contact.recipientsText: Recipients of the data may be technical service providers acting as processors for the operation and maintenance of our website.
contact.storageText1: Data is deleted no later than [please add information] after the inquiry has been processed.
contact.storageText2: If a contractual relationship arises, we are subject to statutory retention obligations. These are generally 6 or 10 years for reasons of proper accounting and tax regulations.
contact.provisionText1: The provision of your personal data is voluntary.
contact.provisionText2: However, we can only process your inquiry if you provide us with the necessary information and the reason for your inquiry.
contact.objectionText: For information on your right to object under Art. 21 GDPR, please refer to the section below.

objectionInfo.heading: Information on Your Right to Object under Art. 21 GDPR
objectionInfo.caseBasedText1: You have the right to object at any time, on grounds relating to your particular situation, to the processing of personal data concerning you that is carried out pursuant to Art. 6(1)(f) GDPR (data processing based on legitimate interests); this includes profiling based on this provision within the meaning of Art. 4(4) GDPR.
objectionInfo.caseBasedText2: If you object, we will no longer process your personal data unless we can demonstrate compelling legitimate grounds for the processing which override your interests, rights, and freedoms, or the processing serves the establishment, exercise, or defense of legal claims.

changes.heading: Changes to Our Privacy Policy
changes.text: We reserve the right to amend this privacy policy to ensure it always complies with current legal requirements or to implement changes to our services in the privacy policy, e.g. when introducing new services. Your next visit will then be subject to the new privacy policy.

questions.heading: Questions About Data Protection
questions.text: If you have any questions regarding data protection, please send us an email to the controller named above.

copyright.heading: Copyright Notice
copyright.text1: This privacy policy was created with the help of activeMind
